cargo_delivery.name: Imperial Presence
cargo_delivery.instructions: If you have [Negative] reputation with a patrol in your space, end your action step. Otherwise, resolve the section below that matches the result rolled for the cargo.

resolutions.description: "Attention unknown vessel. Cut thrust and prepared to be boarded or you will be fired upon."
resolutions.instructions: Fight ship combat against TIE fighters ([Ship Combat Value] 3). If you win and you are not defeated, deliver this cargo and end your turn. Otherwise, end your turn.

resolutions.description: "Nothing in these crates but foodstuffs, officer."
resolutions.instructions: Test Influence. If you pass, deliver this cargo and end your turn. If you fail, lose 1 Imperial reputation and end your turn.

If you have [Negative] or [Neutral] Imperial reputation, test Stealth. If you pass or have [Positive] Imperial reputation, deliver this cargo and end your turn. If you fail, lose 1 Imperial reputation and end your turn.

cargo_delivery.name: Unwanted Attention
cargo_delivery.instructions: If you have [Negative] reputation with a patrol in your space, end your action step. Otherwise, resolve the section below that matches the result rolled for the cargo.

resolutions.description: "I beg your pardon. I am afraid that cargo is the property of my master, Sutha the Hutt."
resolutions.instructions: You may lose 1 Hutt reputation to deliver this cargo and end your turn. Otherwise, end your turn.

resolutions.description: "The Rebellion needs this cargo more than you."
resolutions.instructions: You may lose 1 Rebel reputation to deliver this cargo and end your turn. Otherwise, end your turn.

resolutions.description: "As you can see from our credentials, we are legitimate customs officials."
resolutions.instructions: You may lose 1 Syndicate reputation to deliver this cargo and end your turn. Otherwise, end your turn.

cargo_delivery.name: Special Interest Groups
cargo_delivery.instructions: If you have [Negative] reputation with a patrol in your space, end your action step. Otherwise, resolve the section below that matches the result rolled for the cargo.

resolutions.description: "Sure, you can move your cargo here, just as long as my boss gets her cut."
resolutions.instructions: Deliver your cargo. Lose 1 Syndicate reputation unless you spend [Credits]6,000. Then end your turn.

resolutions.description: "Now there is the matter of your docking fee. And the refueling fee. And the gratuity."
resolutions.instructions: Deliver your cargo. Lose 1 Hutt reputation unless you spend [Credits]6,000. Then end your turn.

resolutions.description: "We want the cargo, but please…the Rebellion can't afford your price."
resolutions.instructions: Deliver your cargo. Lose 1 Rebel reputation unless you spend [Credits]6,000. Then end your turn.

cargo_delivery.name: Local Security
cargo_delivery.instructions: If you have [Negative] reputation with a patrol in your space, end your action step. Otherwise, resolve the section below that matches the result rolled for the cargo.

resolutions.description: "The boss wants what's in the box."
resolutions.instructions: Either discard this cargo or fight a ground combat against crooks ([Ground Combat Value] 3). If you win and you are not defeated, deliver this cargo and end your turn. Otherwise end your turn.

resolutions.description: "You'll never get past the checkpoint without being seen."
resolutions.instructions: Test Stealth. If you pass, deliver this cargo and end your turn. If you fail, lose 1 reputation with your planet's faction and end your turn.
Test Piloting. If you pass, deliver this cargo and end your turn. If you fail, lose 1 reputation with your planet's faction and end your turn.

contact.name: 4-LOM
contact.encounter_description: Logic glitches turned a protocol droid into a bounty hunter, eager for new opportunities.
contact.encounter_instructions: You may spend [Credits]3,000 to gain the crew below and discard 4-LOM's token. Reduce this by [Credits]1,000 for each bounty you have.

contact.name: Bib Fortuna
contact.encounter_description: "Day wanna wonga?" he asks as he steps from the shadows. This is your chance to gain the ear of Jabba the Hutt.
contact.encounter_instructions:
You may spend [Credits]2,000 to choose a player. Make that player gain or lose 1 Hutt reputation.
After resolving this card, move Bib Fortuna's token to an empty contact space on Tatooine. If there is not an empty contact space, exchange this token with a contact token on Tatooine.

contact.name: Black Krrsantan
contact.encounter_description: The infamous Wookiee bounty hunter could be valuable ally…or a dangerous enemy.
contact.encounter_instructions:
If you have a bounty or job, you may spend [Credits]1,000 to gain the crew below and discard Black Krrsantan's token.
If you do not gain the crew and you have at least 1 [Negative] reputation, fight a ground combat ([Ground Combat Value] 4). If you win, discard Black Krrsantan's token.

crew.ability: At the start of ground combat, you may spend [Credits]2,000 to gain +2 [Ground Combat Value] for that combat.

contact.name: Black Sun Agent
contact.encounter_description: Black Sun has agents everywhere. Their network of connections is the syndicate's greatest strength.
contact.encounter_instructions:
If you have [Negative] Syndicate reputation, test Stealth. If you fail, your character suffers 2 damage.
If you have [Positive] or [Neutral] Syndicate reputation, you may test Influence. If you pass, gain the crew below and discard Black Sun Agent's token. If you would fail, you may spend [Credits]2,000 to pass this test instead.

crew.ability: Increase the reward for each of your jobs by [Credits]2,000.

contact.name: BoShek
contact.encounter_description: "Don't say 'smuggler'," says the Corellian. "I prefer 'freelance pilot for hire.' Speaking of, are you hiring?"
contact.encounter_instructions: You may spend [Credits]2,000 to gain the crew below and discard BoShek's token.

crew.ability: If you do not roll a [Hit] when delivering ILLEGAL cargo, you may reroll your die.

contact.name: Chewbacca
contact.encounter_description: In his long life, Chewbacca has learned many useful skills. You couldn't ask for a better ally.
contact.encounter_instructions:
If you are Han solo, you may gain the crew below and discard Chrewbacca's token.
Otherwise you may spend [Credits]4,000 to gain the crew below and discard Chrewbacca's token.

contact.name: Dengar
contact.encounter_description: Dengar has a fearsome reputation and decades of experience. You can only hope that you're not the bounty he's after.
contact.encounter_instructions:
If you have at least 1 [Negative] reputation, fight a ground combat against Dengar ([Ground Combat Value] 5). If you win, gain 1 fame and discard Dengar's token.
If you lose, or have no [Negative] reputation, place Dengar's token facedown on his contact space or an empty contact space.

contact.name: Doctor Evazan
contact.encounter_description: "I don't like you either."
contact.encounter_instructions: Test Strength. If you fail, your character suffers 2 damage. Pass or fail, you may spend [Credits]2,000 to gain the crew below and discard Doctor Evazan's token.

crew.ability: At the start of ground combat, choose a die result. During the combat, both players may turn up to 2 of their blank dice to the chosen result.

contact.name: Garindan
contact.encounter_description: This Kubaz spy regularly sells information to the Empire, but he'll work for you if the price is right.
contact.encounter_instructions:
If you have [Negative] Imperial reputation or [Positive] Rebel reputation, test Stealth. If you fail, move the Imperial patrol directly to your space and encounter it.
If you pass or did not perform the test, you may spend [Credits]2,000 to gain the crew below and discard Garindan's token.

crew.action: Spend [Credits]1,000 to secretly look at a contact token on any planet.

contact.name: Grand Admiral Thrawn
contact.encounter_description: The Grand Admiral is looking for someone to sabotage a Rebel cell. You get the feeling that you're only one part of a larger plan.
contact.encounter_instructions:
If you have [Positive] or [Neutral] Imperial reputation, you may discard Grand Admiral Thrawn's token and gain the job below.
If you have [Negative] Imperial reputation fight a ground combat against Deathtroopers ([Ground Combat Value] 4). If you win, prevent 2 damage from this combat.

job.name: Rebellion on Lothal
job.reward: Lose 1 Rebel reputation and gain [Credits]7,000, 1 fame, and 1 Imperial reputation. Then remove this card from the game.

contact.name: Greedo
contact.encounter_description: Greedo has been hired by Jabba the Hutt to hunt down those who have wronged him.
contact.encounter_instructions:
If you have [Negative] Hutt reputation, test Stealth. If you fail, your character suffers 2 damage.
If you have [Positive] or [Neutral] Hutt reputation, you may test Influence. If you pass, gain the crew below and discard Greedo's token. If you would fail, you may spend [Credits]2,000 to pass this test instead.

crew.ability: After you roll dice during ground combat, you may spend [Credits]1,000 to add 1 [Hit].

contact.name: Hera Syndulla
contact.encounter_description: "There's enough darkness in the galaxy right now. Let me know if you want to spread a little light."
contact.encounter_instructions:
If you have [Negative] Imperial reputation or [Positive] Rebel reputation, you may spend [Credits]2,000 to gain the crew below and discard Hera Syndulla's token.
If you do not gain the crew, you may spend [Credits]2,000 to gain 1 Rebel reputation.

crew.action: If you are not at the Maelstrom, test Tech. If you pass, move 1 space. If you fail, your ship suffers 1 damage.

contact.name: Hondo Ohnaka
contact.encounter_description: "Haha my friends! With my brains and your…ahem…capital…why, we will both be rich!"
contact.encounter_instructions: You may spend [Credits]3,000 to gain the crew below and discard Hondo Ohnaka's token.

crew.ability: Increase the reward on each of your cargo by [Credits]2,000.

contact.name: IG-RM Droid
contact.encounter_description: This bodyguard and enforcer droid works for Cikatro Vizago…but with a little reprogramming, it could work for you.
contact.encounter_instructions:
If you have [Negative] Syndicate reputation, test Stealth. If you fail, your character suffers 2 damage.
If you have [Positive] or [Neutral] Syndicate reputation, you may test Tech. If you pass, gain the crew below and discard IG-RM's token.

contact.name: K-2SO
contact.encounter_description: He thinks you might be a rebel spy, so you'll need a creative way of convincing him otherwise.
contact.encounter_instructions: You may test Tech. If you pass, you may gain the crew below and discard K2-SO's token. If you fail and you have either [Positive] Rebel reputation or [Negative] Imperial reputation, your character suffers 3 damage.

crew.ability: During ground combat, each of your opponent's [Crit] results count as 1 damage instead of 2.

contact.name: Leia Organa
contact.encounter_description: "In a time of fear, we have only one weapon left: hope. Fortunately, that is all we require."
contact.encounter_instructions:
If you have [Positive] or [Neutral] Rebel reputation, you may discard Leia Organa's token to gain the job below.
If you do not gain the job, you may spend [Credits]2,000 to gain the 1 Rebel reputation.

job.name: Rebel Prison Break
job.encounter: Resolve card #47. If you have [Negative] Imperial reputation, you may resolve this card instead of encountering the Imperial's patrol.
job.reward: Lose 1 Imperial reputation and gain 2 fame and 1 Rebel reputation. Then remove this card from the game.

contact.name: Lobot
contact.encounter_description: Lobot's brain enhancing device allows him direct contact with complex computer systems. Surely you can find a use for such skills.
contact.encounter_instructions:
If you are Lando Calrissian, you may gain the crew below and discard Lobot's token.
Otherwise you may spend [Credits]2,000 to gain the crew below and discard Lobot's token.

crew.ability: When you choose to gain credits during the planning phase, gain an additional [Credits]1,000 for each [Positive] reputation you have.

contact.name: Maz Kanata
contact.encounter_description: They call her the smuggler queen of Takodana. It seems there's nothing Maz does not know.
contact.encounter_instructions:
If you have [Negative] or [Neutral] Imperial reputation, you may spend [Credits]4,000 to gain the crew below and discard Maz Kanata's token.
If you do not gain this crew, move Maz Kanata's token to an empty space on Takodana. If there is not an empty contact space, exchange this token with a contact on Takodana.

crew.ability: Once per turn, after you roll dice for a skill test, you may reroll 1 of your dice.

contact.name: Ponda Baba
contact.encounter_description: He doesn't like you, but a rew credits may change his mind.
contact.encounter_instructions: Test Strength. If you fail, your character suffers 2 damage. Pass or fail, you may spend [Credits]3,000 to gain the crew below and discard Ponda Baba's token.

crew.ability: During ground combat, if you have at least 2 [Focus] results, you win combat regardless of your opponent's results.

contact.name: Saw Gerrera
contact.encounter_description: Even the Rebel Alliance finds Saw Gerrera too extreme.
contact.encounter_instructions:
If you are Jyn Erso, you may gain the crew below and discard Saw Gerrera's token.
If you are not Jyn Erso and you have [Negative] Rebel reputation or [Positive] Imperial reputation, test Stealth. If you fail, your character suffers 2 damage.
If you did not test Stealth, you may test Influence. If you pass, gain the crew below and discard Saw Gurrera's token.

crew.action: Choose another character or ship in your space; it suffers 2 damage. If that player has [Positive] Imperial reputation, it suffers 1 additional damage.

contact.name: W1-LE
contact.encounter_description: Most droids are rather high-strung, so W1-LE's laid back demeanor and easy charm are a pleasant surprise.
contact.encounter_instructions:
If you are Lando Calrissian, you may gain the crew below and discard W1-LE's token.
Otherwise, you may test Tech. If you pass, gain the crew below and discard W1-LE's token. If you would fail, you may spend [Credits]3,000 to pass this test instead.

crew.encounter: Perform a market action, even if you are at a navpoint or performed this action during your action step.

contact.name: Ziton Moj
contact.encounter_description: "This opportunity benefits us both. But there will be a cost."
contact.encounter_instructions: You may lose 1 Syndicate reputation to either gain [Credits]5,000 or take up to [Credits]5,000 from a player that has more fame than you.

rows.description: This is it: the hand you've waited your whole life for. It's time to up the stakes.
rows.instructions: You may place any amount of your credits on this card. If you do not, skip to step 3.

rows.description: Will your opponent fold?
rows.instructions: Your opponent may place the same amount of their credits on this card (or all of their credits if they do not have enough). If they do not, you gain the reward and any of the credits on this card.

rows.description: All that remains is to play out this hand.
rows.instructions:
You choose to test either Knowledge or Tactics. Then your opponent chooses to test their Knowledge or Tactics.
If only 1 player passes, that player gains the reward and all the credits on this card.
If both players pass or both players fail, then repeat this step.

rows.description: You are dealt a bad hand. Hilariously bad. Perhaps you can bluff your way to victory.
rows.instructions: Test Influence. If you pass, skip to step 3.

rows.description: With your weakness exposed, your opponent has an opportunity to finish the game quickly.
rows.instructions: The other player tests Tactics. If they pass, they gain the reward.

rows.description: You're back in the game and putting it all on the table. The winner will be decided by this hand.
rows.instructions: You test Tactics. If you pass, you gain the reward. If you fail, the other player gains the reward.

rows.description: You've barely started playing and you're already about to lose.
rows.instructions: You can choose to cheat. If you do, skip to step 3.

rows.description: Your opponent calls, and you're left with two options. Either take your losses or open fire.
rows.instructions:
You choose to either fight a ground combat against your opponent or let your opponent gain the reward.
If you fight a ground combat, the winner gains the reward.

rows.description: You pull a card from your sleeve and hope your opponent doesn't notice.
rows.instructions:
You test Stealth. If you pass, you gain the reward. If you fail, the other player chooses to proceed to step 2 or test Influence.
If they test Influence and pass, they gain the reward. If they fail, you gain the reward.

job_resolution.name: Tenuous Alliance
job_resolution.instructions: Resolve the section below that matches the job you are resolving.

rows.label: [Hutt]
rows.title: Hutt Favor
rows.description: The Hutt wonders if you work for his rivals.
rows.instructions: If you have [Positive] Syndicate reputation, discard this job.

rows.label: [Imperial]
rows.title: Imperial Favor
rows.description: You are accused of being a Rebel sympathizer.
rows.instructions: If you have [Positive] Rebel reputation, discard this job.

rows.label: [Rebel]
rows.title: Rebel Favor
rows.description: The Rebels probe your loyalty.
rows.instructions: If you have [Positive] Imperial reputation, discard this job.

rows.label: [Syndicate]
rows.title: Syndicate Favor
rows.description: The boss fears that you may be allied with her enemies.
rows.instructions: If you have [Positive] Hutt reputation, discard this job.

job_resolution.name: Lost Faith
job_resolution.instructions: Resolve the section below that matches the job you are resolving.

rows.label: [Hutt]
rows.title: Hutt Favor
rows.description: The Hutts are not forgiving of failure.
rows.instructions: Test Influence. If you fail, lose 1 Hutt reputation.

rows.label: [Imperial]
rows.title: Imperial Favor
rows.description: The Empire does not accept failure.
rows.instructions: Test Influence. If you fail, lose 1 Imperial reputation.

rows.label: [Rebel]
rows.title: Rebel Favor
rows.description: Your recklessness has almost exposed the Rebellion. You claim that it was not your fault.
rows.instructions: Test Influence. If you fail, lose 1 Rebel reputation.

rows.label: [Syndicate]
rows.title: Syndicate Favor
rows.description: Your failure is a sign of weakness.
rows.instructions: Test Influence. If you fail, lose 1 Syndicate reputation.

rows.description: The first part of the plan involves distracting the security guard with small talk.
rows.instructions: Test Influence. If you fail, the job fails (keep the job card).

rows.description: You try to slice into their system and add some credits to your account.
rows.instructions: Test Tech. If you fail, your character suffers 1 damage and skip to step 4.

rows.description: Just as you're finishing up, a patrolling officer notices you. You'll need to quickly subdue him.
rows.instructions: Test Strength. If you pass, complete this job.

rows.description: An alarm is raised and security storms the room!
rows.instructions: Fight a ground combat against the local security ([Ground Combat Value] 3). If you win and are not defeated, complete this job. If you lose, complete this step.

rows.description: The first step of the plan involves taking an airspeeder through treacherous bluffs into a hidden cave.
rows.instructions: Test Piloting. If you fail, your character suffers 2 damage.

rows.description: You slip into the cave and see many guards blocking the entrance. There are too many of them, so you'll need to sneak by.
rows.instructions: Test Stealth. If you fail, your character suffers 2 damage.

rows.description: You find a back passageway, but the way through is treacherous. Is there another way in?
rows.instructions: Test Knowledge. If you fail, your character suffers 2 damage.

rows.description: The vault is booby-trapped. You try to disable it.
rows.instructions: Test Tech. If you fail. your character suffers 2 damage. If you are not defeated, complete this job.

rows.description: You try to dock with the freighter without attracting attention.
rows.instructions: Test Piloting. If you fail, your ship suffers 1 damage.

rows.description: Once on the ship, you need to pull open a sealed compartment so you can slice the computer.
rows.instructions:
Test Strength and then test Tech.
If you pass both of them, skip to step 4. If you fail at least 1 of them, your ship suffers 1 damage.

rows.description: The slicing fails, and you instead try to blow up the docking clamps.
rows.instructions: Test Tactics. If you fail, your ship suffers 1 damage.

rows.description: A swarm of Black Sun fighters are in pursuit. You try to draw them off.
rows.instructions: Fight a ship combat against Black Sun Fighters ([Ship Combat Value] 3). If you win, prevent 1 damage from this combat. If you are not defeated, complete this job.

rows.description: You'll need to find a safe path through the most dangerous part of the city.
rows.instructions: Test Knowledge. If you fail, your character suffers 1 damage.

rows.description: You run afoul of some local criminals.
rows.instructions: Test Tactics. If you fail, your character suffers 1 damage unless you lose [Credits]3,000.

rows.description: You must talk your way past security.
rows.instructions: Test Influence. If you fail, your character suffers 1 damage.

rows.description: Now to avoid the automated defense system.
rows.instructions: Test Stealth. If you fail, your character suffers 2 damage.

rows.description: The jewel sits before you. Just don't trip the alarm.
rows.instructions: Test Tech. If you pass, complete this job. If you fail, fight a ground combat atainst local security ([Ground Combat Value] 4). If you win, prevent 2 damage from this combat. Win or lose, if you are not defeated, complete this job.

rows.description: You claim to be a crime lord looking to invest money in the space trade.
rows.instructions: Test Influence. If you fail, the job fails (keep this card).

rows.description: You find the hyperfuel but you can hardly lift it.
rows.instructions: Test Strength. If you fail, the job fails (keep this card).

rows.description: The auto-turrets open fire. Take them out!
rows.instructions: Test Tactics. If you fail, your ship suffers 2 damage.

rows.description: You stow the dangerous cargo as safely as you can.
rows.instructions: Test Knowledge. If you fail, your ship suffers 2 damage.

rows.description: A Star Destroyer appears and you plunge into the Maelstrom.
rows.instructions: Move to the Maelstrom then test Piloting. If you fail, your ship suffers 1 damage and repeat this step. If you pass, complete this job.

rows.description: You identify the Imperial ship and attempt to approach undetected.
rows.instructions: Test Stealth. If you pass, skip to step 4.

rows.description: You've been spotted and a squadron of TIE fighters moves to intercept you.
rows.instructions: Fight a ship combat against TIE fighters ([Ship Combat Value] 3). If you win, skip to step 4.

rows.description: One of the TIEs is still trailing you, so you fly dangerously close to the larger ship.
rows.instructions: Test Piloting. If you fail, your ship suffers 2 damage.

rows.description: You dock with the Imperial ship and find your way to the cell block. That's when the Stormtroopers arrive.
rows.instructions: Fight a ground combat against Stormtroopers ([Ground Combat Value] 3). If you win and you are not defeated, complete this job. If you lose, repeat this step.

rows.description: You feign interest in the Rebel cause, hoping to gain access to their facilities.
rows.instructions: Test Influence. If you pass, skip to step 3.

rows.description: They see through your deception and attempt to subdue you.
rows.instructions: Fight a ground combat against Rebel guards ([Ground Combat Value] 4). If you win, skip to step 4.

rows.description: You attempt to steal several heavy crates of unstable explosives.
rows.instructions: Test Strength. If you fail, your character suffers 2 damage.

rows.description: You set some charges in the Rebel facility and attempt to escape before it explodes.
rows.instructions: Test Tactics. If you fail, your character suffers 3 damage. If you are not defeated, complete this job.

rows.description: You need to decipher your map to find the entrance to the temple.
rows.instructions: Test Knowledge. If you fail, the job fails (keep this job).

rows.description: You enter the temple, but your first step triggers a trap. Proceed with caution!
rows.instructions: Test Stealth. If you fail, your character suffers 1 damage.

rows.description: You pluck the priceless relic off the pedestal, but the room starts to fill with water. A large boulder crashes down from the ceiling, blocking your only escape route.
rows.instructions: Test Tactics. If you fail, your character suffers 1 damage and repeat this step. If you pass, complete this job.

rows.description: There's a back door to the mines…somewhere.
rows.instructions: Test Knowledge. If you fail, skip to step 3.

rows.description: You enter through a grate in the floor and make your way to the slave quarters.
rows.instructions: Test Stealth. If you pass, skip to step 5.

rows.description: The guards draw their blasters.
rows.instructions: Fight a ground combat against Pyke sentinels ([Ground Combat Value] 4). If you win, skip to step 5.

rows.description: The last sentinel brandishes a stun spear.
rows.instructions: Test Strength. If you fail, your character suffers 1 damage and repeat this step.

rows.description: The door to the prisoner's cell is locked, but so corroded with rust that one good kick should open it.
rows.instructions: Test Strength. If you pass, complete this job. If you fail, your character suffers 1 damage and repeat this step.

rows.description: You ask an information broker about the presence of Imperial spies.
rows.instructions: Test Influence. If you pass, skip to step 3.

rows.description: The broker betrays you, and her minions try to punish you for poking around.
rows.instructions: Fight a ground combat against minions ([Ground Combat Value] 3). If you win, prevent 1 damage from this combat.

rows.description: The spies are getting away, but you think you know a shortcut through the basement.
rows.instructions: Test Knowledge. If you fail, your character suffers 1 damage and repeat this step.

rows.description: You locate the spies, but they are about to leave on their ship. You open fire from a distance, hoping to hit your target.
rows.instructions: Test Tactics. If you fail, your character suffers 1 damage and repeat this step. If you pass, complete this job.

rows.description: You intend to steal a fathier favored to win tomorrow's race. You'll need to find a hole in the stable's security first.
rows.instructions: Test Knowledge. If you fail, the job fails (keep this card).

rows.description: You discover there is a late-night shift change for the stable guards that should give you an opening.
rows.instructions: Test Stealth. If you pass, skip to step 4.

rows.description: The guards spot you and open fire!
rows.instructions: Fight a ground combat against guards ([Ground Combat Value] 3). If you win, prevent 1 damage from this combat.

rows.description: Now to tranquilize the beast and haul it back to your ship.
rows.instructions: Test Strength. If you fail, return to step 3. If you pass, complete this job.

rows.description: The slaver's ship has landed on the planet's surface, and a few Tandoshan guards stand watch.
rows.instructions: Test Stealth. If you pass, skip to step 3.

rows.description: The guards see you coming and draw their weapons.
rows.instructions: Fight a ground combat against Tandoshan guards ([Ground Combat Value] 3). If you win, prevent 1 damage from this combat.

rows.description: You board the ship and see the slaves locked in a peculiar cell. Hopefully there are no booby traps.
rows.instructions: Test Knowledge, if you fail, your character suffers 1 damage.

rows.description: You try to take control of the ship so the Wookiees can fly their way back home.
rows.instructions: Test Tech. If you fail, your character suffers 1 damage and repeat this step. If you pass, complete this job.

bounty.capture_reward: Deliver Ponda Baba's token to Takodana to gain [Credits]10,000 and 1 fame.
bounty.notes: After you gain a reward from this card, remove it from the game.

bounty.capture_reward: Deliver Doctor Evazan's token to Mon Calimari to gain [Credits]10,000 and 1 fame.
bounty.notes: After you gain a reward from this card, remove it from the game.

bounty.capture_reward: Deliver Lobot's token to Catonica to gain [Credits]10,000 and 1 fame.
bounty.notes: After you gain a reward from this card, remove it from the game.

bounty.capture_reward: Deliver Black Sun Agent's token to Ryloth to gain [Credits]10,000 and 1 fame.
bounty.notes: After you gain a reward from this card, remove it from the game.

job.name: Heavy Hitters
job.description: An up-and-coming crime boss is looking for a security escort for his meeting with some unsavory folk.
job.encounter: Test Strength. If you pass, complete this job. If you fail, your character suffers 1 damage.
job.reward: Gain [Credits]4,000 and 1 fame. Then remove this card from the game.

job.name: Safe Passage
job.description: A Pyke capo is looking for someone to escort him through a dangerous sector of space.
job.encounter: Test Strength or Piloting. If you pass, complete this job. If you fail, your character and ship both suffer 1 damage.
job.reward: Gain [Credits]5,000 and 1 fame. Then remove this card from the game.

job.name: Pirate Trouble
job.description: A band of pirates have stolen a precious heirloom from a local crime lord. You've been hired to retrieve it.
job.encounter: Test Piloting. If you pass, complete this job. If you fail, your ship suffers 1 damage.
job.reward: Gain [Credits]4,000 and 1 fame. Then remove this card from the game.
